entry.title: Hydrologic Outlook issued February 05 at 3:38AM PST by NWS
entry.summary: ...RIVER FLOODING POSSIBLE ON THE SKOKOMISH RIVER THIS WEEK... The Skokomish River in Mason County will see rises due to moderate precipitation over the Olympic mountains today, but flooding is not expected. Steady, heavier precipitation may force sharp rises on the river starting late Monday night or early Tuesday, with minor flooding possible by early Wednesday.
